lines.text:
[Daffy is surrounded by German planes]
Messerschmitts! A whole mass of Messerschmitts!

[Daffy flys away. The Messerschmitts shoot each other and crash]
A whole MESS of Messerschmitts!
[Daffy presents Von Vulture with a timebomb disguised as a clock]
May I present you with this little token of our esteem?
For me? Danke schoen! Danke Schoen!
Oh, just a little going away present...

After Daffy hits Hitler on the head with a mallot]
SCH-U-ULTZ!

[pauses in his headlong pursuit of Daffy in order to snap to attention and smartly salute a skunk that ambles across the path in front of him]
Oh - - heil Hitluh!

[later on, after triumphantly slamming the loading-breach shut on the huge Howitzer cannon that Daffy has unwittingly taken refuge inside the barrel of, then saluting grandly in preparation to yanking the firing-cord]
Ahh - - now tdthy and duck ZIS one, you DUCK! Heil HIT-LUH!
